Name: Bloomsbury Martini
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This pinky/rusty drink benefits from a good long stir but the result is an aromatic, medium dry, spicy vanilla Martini.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2003 by Robert Hess and published on DrinkBoy.com
Nutrition: One serving of Bloomsbury Martini contains 186 calories
